July 20, 2016, Lisa was a client of Jennifer’s

It is with great pleasure to write this personal recommendation for Jennifer Bookspan.  I truly believe that outstanding individuals should be recognized for their hard work and dedication to excellence. When I first met Jennifer in 2015, I was initially impressed with her outstanding reputation in the business, enthusiasm, and professional/friendly demeanor. I hit a milestone in my career as an Executive Assistant and was looking for the next new adventure. Jennifer worked diligently to find just the "right fit" for me. She was with me every step of the way and was instrumental in cultivating an incredible relationship between me and my new employer/executive. I can't say enough about Jennifer's professionalism and drive to ensure success for her clients. It was truly a blessing to find her and I know you will feel the same way once you meet her. Thank you for allowing me this opportunity to share with you.

June 27, 2016, Karen was a client of Jennifer’s

I've known Jennifer for many years now, from the client/business perspective as well as being her candidate.  Jennifer is the epitome of what I consider a true business partner.  She spends the right amount of time on the front end of a search understanding leadership style, company culture, team dynamics and role needs.  This allows Jennifer to seamlessly target just the right people for the job (quality over quantity – which I definitely prefer).  She has an acute intuitive sense about “fit” that I've not encountered in a staffing professional previously.She has my highest recommendation!

summary: I started my career on the corporate side of the business, which has given me a keen understanding of businesses – how they work and what they look for. I seek to thoroughly understand each organization I partner with so that I can act as a true representative of the company and provide the best recruiting available. In order to make the right match, I spend a lot of time getting to know both the company and the candidate to ensure a long-term fit.Additionally, I will be involved from initial conversation through follow-up after the offer and onboarding process, as a true business partner.I believe that building long-term relationships is what has made me a successful executive recruiter with a proven track record both with mainstream roles as well as specialized, niched positions. *   Manage over 55 corporate clients ranging in size from $5 Million to $34 Billion*   90% retention rate of clients year after year with 12 client relationships in excess of 5 years*   Multiple-year National Top 10 Account Executive*   Areas of expertise include Operations, Sales, Accounting/Finance and Human Resources.*   Industries represented include: building products, manufacturing, technology and business services.*   Service niche markets in mid-level professional through executive searchGovig is the largest franchise within the Management Recruiters International Network of over 800 offices worldwide. For 2012, we ranked the #1 office worldwide and have ranked in the top 5 every year since our inception. We have proudly held the “Best in Class” award for excellence in customer service for 12 years running.
name: Jennifer (Mitteer) Bookspan
title: Executive Recruiter
